event: Discovery of the cosmic X-ray background by Giacconi’s team (1962)
Birth of Hans Bethe, Nobel laureate for work on stellar nucleosynthesis (1906)
Birth of Harrison Schmitt, Apollo 17 astronaut and geologist (1935)
Mars Pathfinder landed on Mars and deployed the Sojourner rover (1997)
Report of measurements of the solar wind’s impact on Earth’s magnetosphere (1964)
Publication by Maarten Schmidt revealing quasars as distant extragalactic objects (1963)
Evidence of water ice in lunar craters from Earth-based observations (1992)
Announcement of the first space-based detection of gamma-ray bursts by BATSE (1991)
Near-infrared observations of the Milky Way’s center revealed a supermassive black hole (1995)
Hubble study refined the value of the Hubble constant (2001)
Announcement of Raymond Davis Jr.’s solar neutrino experiment results (1968)
Study on the isotopic composition of Apollo lunar samples (1970)
Hubble images of distant galaxies (1990)
Mariner 4’s flyby of Mars (1965)
Birth of Jocelyn Bell Burnell, discoverer of pulsars (1943)
Apollo 11 launched from Kennedy Space Center (1969)
Galileo transmitted images of Jupiter’s atmosphere (1996)
Birth of John Glenn, first American to orbit Earth (1921)
Apollo Guidance Computer lunar landing simulation (1968)
Apollo 11 Moon landing (1969) and Viking 1 Mars landing (1976)
Launch of the Soviet Mars 4 mission (1973)
Hubble observation of a distant supernova (1994)
Launch of the Chandra X-ray Observatory (1999)
Apollo 11 crew splashed down in the Pacific (1969)
Reanalysis of Hubble Deep Field data (1996)
Apollo 15 launched with the first Lunar Roving Vehicle (1971)
Initial results from the Wilkinson Microwave Anisotropy Probe (WMAP) (2003)
Publicized observations confirming the accelerating expansion of the universe (1998)
Hubble captured the 'Pillars of Creation' (1995)
Cassini’s flyby of Titan (2005)
Observation of an exoplanet atmosphere by the Very Large Telescope (2009)
